comment.author: 66757584@N06
comment._content: This is a view of Hong Kong Harbour running from present day Central past Wanchai and Causeway Bay, looking all the way to Lei Yue Mun.  The large ship to the right of the fold is HMS Tamar, a Royal Navy Supply Ship.   HMS Tamar later became the name of a land based base.   It was reclaimed after the handover and is now the site of the Hong Kong Government Offices.
